hero.description: It's never been so easy to easily create polls that you and your friends can use to make decisions on any topic!

section2.title: Forging friendships
section2.description: Build an atmosphere that creates productivity in your organization and your company culture.
section2.point3: Find out the answers right away

section3.title: Collect opinions quickly
section3.description: Need instant feedback? Want to predict voter behavior? Looking for insights to inform your marketing strategy? Build a poll worth voting for—and get all the data you need.
section3.point2: It can be made at any time

1.title: Register and connect with your friends
1.description: Join the VoteVibe community with a quick sign-up, then search for your friends by name or unique code to start playing together!

2.title: Create a room with your favorite game mode
2.description: Choose the game mode that suits you best – whether it's a fun comparison, decision-making tool, or a poll – and set up a room to play.

3.title: Invite your friends by name or room code
3.description: Easily invite your friends by selecting them from your list or sharing the unique room code so they can join instantly.

4.title: Vote for the option you like more
4.description: Let the game begin! Each player chooses between two options based on their personal preference – quick, engaging, and fun.

5.title: Make a decision based on the results
5.description: Once everyone has voted, the system will show the final statistics – helping you make fair and data-driven group decisions.
